about_the_game:
Bockito is a 2D arena shooter with Rougelite elements in the top-down view.

You'll take on the role of a small Bockito, which must independently prove itself against a horde of opponents in several waves. In the course of the game, strong boss opponents must also be defeated.

Features
  • Survive 10 waves of enemies in the demo
  • Four seasons with different effects
  • Defeat different enemy types with different abilities
  • Fight a boss in the demo
  • Learn different skills to defeat your enemies
  • Equip yourself with different items and assemble them into unique item sets

Bockito is a 2D arena shooter with Rougelite elements in the top-down view.

You'll take on the role of a small Bockito, which must independently prove itself against a horde of opponents in several waves. In the course of the game, strong boss opponents must also be defeated.

Features

  • Four seasons with different effects
  • Defeat different enemy types with different abilities
  • Fight a boss in the demo

name: Bockito Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: In Bockito you'll have to fight against a horde of hostile pine cones and other enemies. To do this, equip yourself with different items, learn abilities and combine them into different builds to survive.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
